conclusion: Plan to analyze the image and apply the formula for Ampere force.
Wire bent into a V shape with equal side lengths, placed in a uniform magnetic field with an angle of 60 degrees.
Ampere force formula: F = B × I × l × sin(θ).
Substitute values into the formula: F = B × I × 2l × sin(60°).
Calculate sin(60°) = √3/2 and substitute: F = B × I × 2l × √3/2.
Simplify to find F = √3 × B × I × l.
Final answer: Magnitude of Ampere force is √3 × B × I × l.
